data.name: Paladins RWBY Complete Edition
data.detailed_description:
Unlock all content in the RWBY Crossover Pass instantly, including skins for each hero from the hit Rooster Teeth show!

Unlock all of the content in the RWBY Crossover Pass instantly, including:

4 brand new skins - Ruby Vora, Blake Belladonna Saati, Yang Xiao Long Imani and Weiss Schnee Furia
50 Crystals
100,000 Gold
3 Sprays
4 Avatars
1 Death Card
1 Death Stamp
data.about_the_game:
Unlock all content in the RWBY Crossover Pass instantly, including skins for each hero from the hit Rooster Teeth show!

Unlock all of the content in the RWBY Crossover Pass instantly, including:

4 brand new skins - Ruby Vora, Blake Belladonna Saati, Yang Xiao Long Imani and Weiss Schnee Furia
50 Crystals
100,000 Gold
3 Sprays

data.short_description: Unlock all content in the RWBY Crossover Pass instantly, including skins for each hero from the hit Rooster Teeth show! Includes Ruby Vora, Blake Belladonna Saati, Yang Xiao Long Imani, Weiss Schnee Furia, plus over 20 other rewards including sprays, avatars, and Crystals!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8/10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Phenom II X3, 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
